title: Last Will of Anna de Trinidade Brazil MCQ 1

content.question: The passage best illustrates which of the following features of colonial Latin American history?

choices.label: Racial categories were used to divide colonial societies.
Christian religious practices were shared by many social groups.
Competition between European states influenced colonialism.

content.answer: Christian religious practices were shared by many social groups.
